div.p: Correlative imaging of Tasmanites. Correlative imaging and atomic force microscopy infrared spectroscopy (AFM-IR) characterization, where the Tasmanites is outlined in yellow with one small mineral particle (indicated by the gray arrow) entrained inside: a fluorescence microscopy, showing brightly fluorescing Tasmanites, b topographic image, c IR absorption mapping at 2920 cm −1, d mechanical stiffness mapping at 2920 cm −1
